title: "Machine Learning Aids RFID Tag Reading of Textiles"
excerpt: "Datamars has released a new textile-management solution with its RFID tag readers that employs machine learning (ML), which the firm says can train itself to disregard stray tag reads and thereby enable better read effectiveness."
